member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineException

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The minimum version.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineUnloadException

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineUnloadException.AggregatedExceptions
member.summary: Gets the collection of exceptions .

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute
member.summary: The ExtensionAttribute is used to identify a class that is intended to serve as an extension.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute.Path
member.summary: A unique string identifying the ExtensionPoint for which this Extension is intended. This is an optional field provided NUnit is able to deduce the ExtensionPoint from the Type of the extension class.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute.Description
member.summary: An optional description of what the extension does.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the extension is enabled.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionAttribute.EngineVersion
member.summary: The minimum Engine version for which this extension is designed

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPointAttribute
member.summary: ExtensionPointAttribute is used at the assembly level to identify and document any ExtensionPoints supported by the assembly.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPointAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Construct an ExtensionPointAttribute
member.param: A unique string identifying the extension point.
The required Type of any extension that is installed at this extension point.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPointAttribute.Path
member.summary: The unique string identifying this ExtensionPoint. This identifier is typically formatted as a path using '/' and the set of extension points is sometimes viewed as forming a tree.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPointAttribute.Type
member.summary: The required Type (usually an interface) of any extension that is installed at this ExtensionPoint.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPointAttribute.Description
member.summary: An optional description of the purpose of the ExtensionPoint

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPropertyAttribute
member.summary: The ExtensionPropertyAttribute is used to specify named properties for an extension.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPropertyAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct an ExtensionPropertyAttribute
member.param: The name of the property
The property value

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPropertyAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the property.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.ExtensionPropertyAttribute.Value
member.summary: The property value

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IDriverFactory
member.summary: Interface implemented by a Type that knows how to create a driver for a test assembly.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IDriverFactory.IsSupportedTestFramework(System.Reflection.AssemblyName)
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether a given AssemblyName represents a test framework supported by this factory.
member.param: An AssemblyName referring to the possible test framework.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IDriverFactory.GetDriver(System.Reflection.AssemblyName)
member.summary: Gets a driver for a given test assembly and a framework which the assembly is already known to reference.
member.param: An AssemblyName referring to the test framework.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode
member.summary: The IExtensionNode interface is implemented by a class that represents a single extension being installed on a particular extension point.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.TypeName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the Type of the extension object.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.Enabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is enabled.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.Path
member.summary: Gets the unique string identifying the ExtensionPoint for which this Extension is intended. This identifier may be supplied by the attribute marking the extension or deduced by NUnit from the Type of the extension class.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.Description
member.summary: Gets an optional description of what the extension does.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.TargetFramework
member.summary: The TargetFramework of the extension assembly.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.PropertyNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of the names of all this extension's properties

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionNode.GetValues(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a collection of the values of a particular named property If none are present, returns an empty enumerator.
member.param: The property name
member.returns: A collection of values

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionPoint
member.summary: An ExtensionPoint represents a single point in the TestEngine that may be extended by user addins and extensions.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionPoint.Path
member.summary: Gets the unique path identifying this extension point.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionPoint.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of this extension point. May be null.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionPoint.TypeName
member.summary: Gets the FullName of the Type required for any extension to be installed at this extension point.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IExtensionPoint.Extensions
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of IExtensionNodes for extensions installed on this extension point.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver
member.summary: The IFrameworkDriver interface is implemented by a class that is able to use an external framework to explore or run tests under the engine.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.ID
member.summary: Gets and sets the unique identifier for this driver, used to ensure that test ids are unique across drivers.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.Load(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Loads the tests in an assembly.
member.returns: An Xml string representing the loaded test

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.CountTestCases(System.String)
member.summary: Count the test cases that would be executed.
member.param: An XML string representing the TestFilter to use in counting the tests
member.returns: The number of test cases counted

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.Run(NUnit.Engine.ITestEventListener,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the tests in an assembly.
member.param: An ITestEventHandler that receives progress notices
A XML string representing the filter that controls which tests are executed
member.returns: An Xml string representing the result

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.Explore(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about the tests in an assembly.
member.param: An XML string representing the filter that controls which tests are included
member.returns: An Xml string representing the tests

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IFrameworkDriver.StopRun(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Cancel the ongoing test run. If no test is running, the call is ignored.
member.param: If true, cancel any ongoing test threads, otherwise wait for them to complete.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject
member.summary: Interface for the various project types that the engine can load.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject.ProjectPath
member.summary: Gets the path to the file storing this project, if any. If the project has not been saved, this is null.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject.ActiveConfigName
member.summary: Gets the active configuration, as defined by the particular project.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject.ConfigNames
member.summary: Gets a list of the configs for this project

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject.GetTestPackage
member.summary: Gets a test package for the primary or active configuration within the project. The package includes all the assemblies and any settings specified in the project format.
member.returns: A TestPackage

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProject.GetTestPackage(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a TestPackage for a specific configuration within the project. The package includes all the assemblies and any settings specified in the project format.
member.param: The name of the config to use
member.returns: A TestPackage for the named configuration.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.Extensibility.IProjectLoader
member.summary: The IProjectLoader interface is implemented by any class that knows how to load projects in a specific format.

member.summary: Returns true if the file indicated is one that this loader knows how to load.

member.returns: True if the loader knows how to load this file, otherwise false

member.summary: Loads a project of a known format.
member.param: The path of the project file
member.returns: An IProject interface to the loaded project or null if the project cannot be loaded

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel
member.summary: InternalTraceLevel is an enumeration controlling the level of detailed presented in the internal log.

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Default
member.summary: Use the default settings as specified by the user.

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Off
member.summary: Do not display any trace messages

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Error
member.summary: Display Error messages only

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Warning
member.summary: Display Warning level and higher messages

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Info
member.summary: Display informational and higher messages

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Debug
member.summary: Display debug messages and higher - i.e. all messages

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.InternalTraceLevel.Verbose
member.summary: Display debug messages and higher - i.e. all messages

member.summary: The max number of files saved

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRecentFiles.Entries
member.summary: Get a list of all the file entries
member.returns: The most recent file list

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.IRecentFiles.SetMostRecent(System.String)
member.summary: Set the most recent file name, reordering the saved names as needed and removing the oldest if the max number of files would be exceeded. The current CLR version is used to create the entry.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.IRecentFiles.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a file from the list
member.param: The name of the file to remove

member.summary: Gets an array of the available formats

member.param: The name of the format to be used
A set of arguments to be used in constructing the writer or null if non arguments are needed
member.returns: An IResultWriter

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework
member.summary: Interface implemented by objects representing a runtime framework.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework.Id
member.summary: Gets the inique Id for this runtime, such as "net-4.5"

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the framework, such as ".NET 4.5"

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework.FrameworkVersion
member.summary: Gets the framework version: usually contains two components, Major and Minor, which match the corresponding CLR components, but not always.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework.ClrVersion
member.summary: Gets the Version of the CLR for this framework

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFramework.Profile
member.summary: Gets a string representing the particular profile installed, or null if there is no profile. Currently. the only defined values are Full and Client.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFrameworkService
member.summary: Implemented by a type that provides information about the current and other available runtimes.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFrameworkService.IsAvailable(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the runtime framework represented by the string passed as an argument is available.
member.param: A string representing a framework, like 'net-4.0'
member.returns: True if the framework is available, false if unavailable or nonexistent

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.IRuntimeFrameworkService.SelectRuntimeFramework(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage)
member.summary: Selects a target runtime framework for a TestPackage based on the settings in the package and the assemblies themselves. The package RuntimeFramework setting may be updated as a result and the selected runtime is returned.
member.param: A TestPackage
member.returns: The selected RuntimeFramework

member.summary: Started successfully

member.summary: Service failed to start and is unavailable

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine
member.summary: ITestEngine represents an instance of the test engine. Clients wanting to discover, explore or run tests start require an instance of the engine, which is generally acquired from the TestEngineActivator class.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.Services
member.summary: Gets the IServiceLocator interface, which gives access to certain services provided by the engine.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.WorkDirectory
member.summary: Gets and sets the directory path used by the engine for saving files. Some services may ignore changes to this path made after initialization. The default value is the current directory.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.InternalTraceLevel
member.summary: Gets and sets the InternalTraceLevel used by the engine. Changing this setting after initialization will have no effect. The default value is the value saved in the NUnit settings.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.Initialize
member.summary:
Initialize the engine. This includes initializing mono addins, setting the trace level and creating the standard set of services used in the Engine.
This interface is not normally called by user code. Programs linking only to the nunit.engine.api assembly are given a pre-initialized instance of TestEngine. Programs that link directly to nunit.engine usually do so in order to perform custom initialization.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.GetRunner(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage)
member.summary: Returns a test runner instance for use by clients in discovering, exploring and executing tests.
member.param: The TestPackage for which the runner is intended.
member.returns: An ITestRunner.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestEventListener
member.summary: The ITestListener interface is used to receive notices of significant events while a test is running. Its single method accepts an Xml string, which may represent any event generated by the test framework, the driver or any of the runners internal to the engine. Use of Xml means that any driver and framework may add additional events and the engine will simply pass them on through this interface.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEventListener.OnTestEvent(System.String)
member.summary: Handle a progress report or other event.
member.param: An XML progress report.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterBuilder
member.summary: Interface to a TestFilterBuilder, which is used to create TestFilters

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterBuilder.AddTest(System.String)
member.summary: Add a test to be selected
member.param: The full name of the test, as created by NUnit

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterBuilder.SelectWhere(System.String)
member.summary: Specify what is to be included by the filter using a where clause.
member.param: A where clause that will be parsed by NUnit to create the filter.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterBuilder.GetFilter
member.summary: Get a TestFilter constructed according to the criteria specified by the other calls.
member.returns: A TestFilter.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterService
member.summary: The TestFilterService provides builders that can create TestFilters

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestFilterService.GetTestFilterBuilder
member.summary: Get an uninitialized TestFilterBuilder

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestRun
member.summary: The ITestRun class represents an ongoing test run.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestRun.Result
member.summary: Get the result of the test.
member.returns: An XmlNode representing the test run result

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRun.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: Blocks the current thread until the current test run completes or the timeout is reached
member.param: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait or -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
member.returns: True if the run completed

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner
member.summary: Interface implemented by all test runners.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.IsTestRunning
member.summary: Get a flag indicating whether a test is running

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Load
member.summary: Load a TestPackage for possible execution
member.returns: An XmlNode representing the loaded package.
member.remarks: This method is normally optional, since Explore and Run call it automatically when necessary. The method is kept in order to make it easier to convert older programs that use it.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Unload
member.summary: Unload any loaded TestPackage. If none is loaded, the call is ignored.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Reload
member.summary: Reload the current TestPackage
member.returns: An XmlNode representing the loaded package.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.CountTestCases(NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Count the test cases that would be run under the specified filter.
member.param: A TestFilter
member.returns: The count of test cases

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Run(NUnit.Engine.ITestEventListener,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Run the tests in the loaded TestPackage and return a test result. The tests are run synchronously and the listener interface is notified as it progresses.
member.param: The listener that is notified as the run progresses
A TestFilter used to select tests
member.returns: An XmlNode giving the result of the test execution

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.RunAsync(NUnit.Engine.ITestEventListener,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Start a run of the tests in the loaded TestPackage. The tests are run asynchronously and the listener interface is notified as it progresses.
member.param: The listener that is notified as the run progresses
A TestFilter used to select tests

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.StopRun(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Cancel the ongoing test run. If no test is running, the call is ignored.
member.param: If true, cancel any ongoing test threads, otherwise wait for them to complete.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Explore(NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Explore a loaded TestPackage and return information about the tests found.
member.param: The TestFilter to be used in selecting tests to explore.
member.returns: An XmlNode representing the tests found.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineActivator

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter
member.summary: Abstract base for all test filters. A filter is represented by an XmlNode with <filter> as its topmost element. In the console runner, filters serve only to carry this XML representation, as all filtering is done by the engine.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The XML text that specifies the filter.

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.Empty
member.summary: The empty filter - one that always passes.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.Text
member.summary: Gets the XML representation of this filter as a string.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage
member.summary: TestPackage holds information about a set of test files to be loaded by a TestRunner. Each TestPackage represents tests for one or more test files. TestPackages may be named or anonymous, depending on how they are constructed.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct a named TestPackage, specifying a file path for the assembly or project to be used.
member.param: The file path.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Construct an anonymous TestPackage that wraps test files.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.ID
member.summary: Every test package gets a unique ID used to prefix test IDs within that package.
member.remarks: The generated ID is only unique for packages created within the same application domain. For that reason, NUnit pre-creates all test packages that will be needed.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the package

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.FullName
member.summary: Gets the path to the file containing tests. It may be an assembly or a recognized project type.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.SubPackages
member.summary: Gets the list of SubPackages contained in this package

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings dictionary for this package.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.AddSubPackage(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage)
member.summary: Add a subproject to the package.
member.param: The subpackage to be added

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.AddSetting(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Add a setting to a package and all of its subpackages.
member.param: The name of the setting
The value of the setting
member.remarks: Once a package is created, subpackages may have been created as well. If you add a setting directly to the Settings dictionary of the package, the subpackages are not updated. This method is used when the settings are intended to be reflected to all the subpackages under the package.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.GetSetting``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Return the value of a setting or a default.
member.param: The name of the setting
The default value
